price: 130. Waxaana ku qabannay reer Fircoon abaaro iyo mirahoo ka yaraada bal inay waansamaan.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَخَذۡنَآ ءَالَ فِرۡعَوۡنَ بِٱلسِّنِينَ وَنَقۡصٖ مِّنَ ٱلثَّمَرَٰتِ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَذَّكَّرُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: walaqad akhadhnā āla fir'ʿawna bil-sinīna wanaqṣin mina al-thamarāti laʿallahum yadhakkarūna
